content:
Assign Article Actions to Public Groups

Article actions let agents participate in the article publishing process. By default, all article actions are assigned to users with the “Manage Articles” user permission. Agents can complete an action as long as they have the correct article type permission.

To control article action access, assign public groups to article actions and add agents to relevant public groups. Approval processes can also be created to restrict actions like publishing.

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS:
Customize Application
Manage Users
Manage Salesforce Knowledge

This table summarizes article type permissions for each article action:

ARTICLE ACTION	CREATE	READ	EDIT	DELETE
Publish Articles				
Archive Articles				
Delete Articles				
Edit Published and Archived Articles				
Submit Articles for Translation				
Publish Translation				
Edit Translation				

From Setup, enter Knowledge Article Actions, select it, click Edit, choose a public group for the desired action, and save.
title: Assigning Article Actions to Public Groups in Service Cloud
